title: Danmuji Muchim (Seasoned Pickled Radish)
ingredients: •	7 oz (200g) yellow pickled radish (danmuji), any shape, cut into bite-sized pieces
directions: 1.	In a large bowl, stir together the green onion, garlic, chili pepper flakes, sesame oil, and sesame seeds until thoroughly combined.

2.	Add the yellow pickled radish, and gently toss until every piece of radish is fully coated. Serve with hot rice and other Korean side dishes, or transfer to an airtight container and refrigerate for up to 1 week.
